item1.description:
The main tech stack used for this role includes Next.js, Javascript/Typescript, React, Scss and HTML. Alongside this I’m experienced in writing unit and E2E tests using libraries such as Jest and Cypress.
 I’ve also gained experience in backend technologies, developing APIs, working with databases and using terraform to build severless architectures. Working with serverless technologies I’ve gained experience in working with several AWS services including Lambda’s, API Gateway and Event bridge.
Familiar with using observability tools such as Datadog to monitor and debug the performance of software. I regularly use datadog to review new bugs and look for performance optimisations.
Alongside technical skills I’ve demonstrated strong organisation and communication skills. Working within an agile team, I understand how to break down features into iterable stories that deliver value to both the company and our customers efficiently.
Joining as a junior frontend engineer, I have consistently displayed strong technical skills and delivered high quality code which resulted in being promoted to mid level frontend engineer within 2 years.
Within the first 6 months of the role I took on my first position as project lead, which was delivered in record time. This required strong leadership and communication skills to deliver, by collaborating with technical leads to plan the project.
item1.title: Frontend Engneer

item2.description:
During this period I decided to commit to studying web development to prepare for a career change. Having previously worked in various digital marketing roles, I had gained experience in web development and acquired a strong interest in this area. Eventually I made the decision to pursue a more fulfilling career, switching from marketing to frontend engineering.
I enrolled on a frontend development course with a company called The Learning People in 2021, which focussed on the core technologies of web development, including: HTML5, CSS and Javascript. This course also covered git version control.
Following this course, I was introduced to various popular frameworks and decided to complete a course in React with Udemy. After gaining these technical skills I regularly practiced by working on personal projects, some of which can be viewed on my digital CV.
item2.title: Frontend Engineer - Student

item3.description: I joined the company as a PPC specialist, but within 1 year of joining I had acquired the responsibilities of managing a multi channel acquisition strategy. I was promoted from PPC specialist to performance marketing manager during my time at Ocado, leading on the acquisition of new customers through our digital platforms including PPC, display marketing, affiliate and paid social channels.
item3.title: Performance Marketing Manager

item4.description: Developed the strategy and execution of Work.Life’s content and performance marketing channels. During my time at Work.Life I successfully managed the development of a new company website, which involved working collaboratively with a team of frontend developers and ensuring the website was optimised from a technical SEO point of view.
item4.title: Senior Digital Marketing Executive

item5.description: At FABRICA I managed the acquisition channels within the digital team. This involved building HTML email templates, working collaboratively with frontend developers to create new landing pages and improving the company websites SEO.
item5.title: Digital Marketing Executive
